de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.im.adapter.connection

Interface ImConnectionAdapter

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ImcConnectionAdapter, ImvConnectionAdapter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ImcConnectionAdapterIetf, ImvConnectionAdapterIetf

    public interface ImConnectionAdapter
    Generic adapter base for an IM(C/V) connection.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Object getAttribute(de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.attribute.TncAttributeType type)
      Get a connection attribute by the give type.

      Request handshake for the connection with the given reason.
      void sendMessage(ImObjectComponent component, long identifier)
      Sends a integrity measurement component message from the IM(C/V) to the lower layers.

    • Method Detail

      • sendMessage

        void sendMessage(ImObjectComponent component,
               long identifier)
                 throws de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.exception.TncException,
                        ValidationException
        Sends a integrity measurement component message from the IM(C/V) to the lower layers.
        Parameters:
        component - the component message
        identifier - the connection unique identifier for the message
        Throws:
        de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.exception.TncException - if the transmission fails
        ValidationException - if the serialization for the transmission fails

      • requestHandshakeRetry

        void requestHandshakeRetry(de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.report.enums.ImHandshakeRetryReasonEnum reason)
                           throws de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.exception.TncException
        Request handshake for the connection with the given reason.
        Parameters:
        reason - the reason for the request
        Throws:
        de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.exception.TncException - if handshake is not acceptable

        Get a connection attribute by the give type.
        Parameters:
        type - the attribute type
        Returns:
        the attribute
        Throws:
        de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.exception.TncException - if the attribute was not accessible
